ygData.subject: Re: SBLive Stuff [OT]
ygData.msgSnippet: I tend to be an early adopters with Drivers (as long as the word Beta doesn t appear in the version number) and put the latest drivers shortly after they
ygData.messageBody:
I tend to be an "early adopters" with Drivers (as long as the word "Beta"
doesn't appear in the version number) and put the latest drivers shortly
after they were released by Creative. I've never have seen an SB-Live
related crash.

As far as "realism" of the sound - I have to mention - when I first
started - my cats would completely freak out from the Spider clacking
sound.. It took them a while to get used to it...

Slyde
----- Original Message -----
From: <silky@...>
To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Thursday, February 03, 2000 3:02 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] SBLive crashes (OT) Sound Problems in general
